text: tīrccayāyuṁ satyaviśvāsikaḷil avaril ninn tanneyuḷḷa oru dūtane niyēāgikkuka vaḻi allāhu mahattāya anugrahamāṇ avarkk nalkiyiṭṭuḷḷat‌. allāhuvinṟe dr̥ṣṭāntaṅṅaḷ avarkk ōtikēḷpikkukayuṁ, avare sanskarikkukayuṁ, avarkku granthavuṁ jñānavuṁ paṭhippikkukayuṁ ceyyunna (oru dūtane). avarākaṭṭe mump vyaktamāya vaḻikēṭil tanneyāyirunnu
